Basin Wrench: Featuring a unique arc + tooth design, the wrench head fits more snugly with the sink interface or nuts and bolts. Its replaceable head adapts to a wider range of sink interfaces or nuts and bolts

Adjustable Jaw: It incorporates a spring-loaded mechanism that allows the user to adjust the jaw size (1-1/4''to 2-1/2") to accommodate different nut or bolt sizes commonly found in plumbing application

name: SHALL 11'' Basin Wrench, Adjustable Sink Wrench Faucet Tool, Full Polished Tap Nut Spanner with 3/8'' to 1-1/4'' Jaw Capacity for Hard-to-Reach Under-Sink Spaces
short_description: [Tame Tight Spaces with the SHALL Basin Wrench] Engineered for under-sink battles! The SHALL Basin Wrench boasts spring-loaded jaws that auto-adjust from 3/8" to 1-1/4", gripping faucet nuts, supply line fittings, and drain pipes with vice-like precision. Its 11-inch slim shaft slips behind toilets, under vanities, or around cramped plumbing—no more skinned knuckles! Includes black rubber gloves for grip and waterproof tape to seal leaks mid-job. Perfect for DIYers tired of stripped nuts!

[180° Pivoting Head Conquers Impossible Angles] Twist where others can’t! The SHALL Basin Wrench’s 180-degree rotating head locks at any position, letting you torque nuts in shadowy corners or vertical gaps. The full-polished chrome finish resists corrosion, while sharpened teeth bite into rusted or rounded nuts without slipping. Pro tip: Pair with the gloves for oily pipe work—no slips, just smooth turns!

[Pro-Grade Grip, DIY-Friendly Power] Outmuscle stubborn fittings effortlessly! Forged from high-carbon steel, this Basin Wrench delivers 2x the torque of flimsy competitors. The ergonomic T-handle reduces wrist strain during marathon plumbing sessions, and the black-coated jaws prevent scratches on chrome finishes. Ideal for swapping garbage disposals or fixing leaky shower valves!

[Complete Kit for Emergency Repairs] Be ready for anything! Unlike basic wrenches, the SHALL Basin Wrench Set bundles black rubber gloves (oil/water-resistant) and waterproof tape—essential for quick fixes under dripping pipes. The compact design tucks in tool belts or kitchen drawers. Tackle bathroom remodels, RV plumbing, or Airbnb maintenance like a seasoned handyman!
